DOC.brief_summary: The main goal treat early NLUTS relieve lower urinary tract syndrome prevent late complication . The present study evaluate efficacy electrical pudendal nerve stimulation ( EPNS ) transanal/transvaginal electrical stimulation ( TES ) NLUTD.The study design consist non-randomized , parallel control trial . A total 60 eligible patient involve divided EPNS TES group accord location medical treatment . The primary endpoint lower urinary tract syndrome ( ICIQ-FLUTS/MLUTS ) . The second endpoint assessment daily life Qol ( ICIQ-LUTSqol ) , residual urine volume .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Electrical Pudendal Nerve Stimulation Neurogenic Lower Urinary Tract Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: Age 18+ year ; Diagnosed NLUTD ; Incomplete spinal cord injury ( SCI ) , include limited conus medullaris syndrome , cauda equina syndrome , etc . ; Radical pelvic surgery : include limited total hysterectomy etc . ; Informed consent sign . Anatomical bladder outlet obstruction ( e.g. , prostate enlargement , tumor ) ; NLUTD induce stroke , multiple sclerosis , HIV , diabetes mellitus , drug , inflammation tumor central nervous system etc . ; Lower urinary tract infection ; Unwillingness participate .
